liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

costs.label: Standard-Einsatz
costs.tooltip: Set the default cost for this command.

maxcost.label: Maximaler-Einsatz
maxcost.tooltip: Set the maximum cost for this command.

reward11.label: Winning multiplier (11)
reward11.tooltip: Set the winning multiplier for getting 11

reward12.tooltip: Set the winning multiplier for getting 12

reward13.label: Winning multiplier (13)
reward13.tooltip: Set the winning multiplier for getting 13

reward14.label: Winning multiplier (14)
reward14.tooltip: Set the winning multiplier for getting 14

reward15.label: Winning multiplier (15)
reward15.tooltip: Set the winning multiplier for getting 15

reward16.label: Winning multiplier (16)
reward16.tooltip: Set the winning multiplier for getting 16

reward17.label: Winning multiplier (17)

reward18.label: Winning multiplier (18)

onCooldown.value: $user, $command ist noch auf Cooldown für $cd Minuten!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

onUserCooldown.value: $user, $command ist für dich immernoch auf Cooldown für $cd Minuten!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 $user = Username 
 $cd = Time remaining 
 $command = Command name

responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough points
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user doesn't have enough points.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of currency
 $cost = Cost to play

responseWon.label: User wins message
responseWon.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user wins.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of currency
 $reward = Winning reward
 $cost = Cost to play 
 $dices = Three dices 
 $dicesSum = The sum of the three dices 
 $dice1 = First dice number 
 $dice2 = Second dice number 
 $dice3 = Third dice number

responseLost.value: $user würfelt: $dices Eine $dicesSum, du verlierst deinen Einsatz und hast nur noch $newpointsafterloss $currency.
responseLost.label: User looses message
responseLost.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user loose.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play 
 $dices = Three dices 
 $dicesSum = The sum of the three dices 
 $dice1 = First dice number 
 $dice2 = Second dice number 
 $dice3 = Third dice number

tooMuchEinsatz.value: $user Bruder, so viel Einsatz ist nicht drin
tooMuchEinsatz.label: Nachricht bei zu hohem Einsatz
tooMuchEinsatz.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user loose.
 $user = Username
 $points = Current user points
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play 
 $dices = Three dices 
 $dicesSum = The sum of the three dices 
 $dice1 = First dice number 
 $dice2 = Second dice number 
 $dice3 = Third dice number

cooldownCheck.label: Cooldown-Info
cooldownCheck.tooltip: Message that will be posted if someone uses $command cooldown

infomessage.value: Bei $command würfelt mal 3 Würfel, je höher die Augenzahlen, desto mehr Gewinn!
infomessage.label: Info-Nachricht bei $command info
